name: Canoness

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in Faction Crypts by 20%

skills.name: Lead the Charge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on a random ally for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5

skills.name: Blinding Assault
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +109
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +109
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Stalwart Guardian
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] the target for 2 turns. Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Sacred Order
faction.default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 53 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Canoness is a epic def champion from the faction Sacred Order doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Sacred Order, Canoness is a champion of Epic rarity and of Def type
